page.title: 06FASHION 85
page.content: Fashion changes continuously. {FASHION FOR SUMMER.}GIRLS: Mainly light coloured cotton clothes ; e.g. skirts,trousers,shorts, bat-winged t-shirts,and tanktops (a sleeveless jumper). BOYS: Tanktop,t-shirts, trousers, shorts,shirts,again very light wear. {FOOTWEAR FOR SUMMER}GIRLS like wearing trainers (A soft lace up shoe),sandals and slip on shoes. BOYS mostly like trainers and are not too keen on sandals.{WINTER FASHION } GIRLS: Mainly woolies and long sleeved jumpers. Thick denim jeans for home wear,long corduroy skirts for school.{WARM CLOTHES.}BOYS. Thick woolies and long trousers, denim jeans for home and grey trousers for school. {FOOTWEAR FOR WINTER.}GIRLS like slip- ons,trainers,boots. BOYS like Trainers and decent leather shoes.
